death.attack.goose_bother: %1$s was pestered t’ death by a goose
death.attack.goose_peck: %1$s was peck’d t’ the briny deep
death.attack.goose_honk: %1$s got blasted by the goose’s mighty honk
death.attack.goose_honk.item: %1$s was felled by a goose’s honk, with %3$s in tow
advancement.silly-goose.honk_and_run.des: Take a mighty honk t’ the face
advancement.silly-goose.hit_and_run.desc: Be struck down by a cutlass-wieldin’ goose
advancement.silly-goose.unfair_trade.des: Trade grub fer a goose’s blade
splash.silly-goose.goose_overlords: Do NOT feed bread t’ the geese.
splash.silly-goose.untitled_goose_game: Try that Goose Game ye lubber!
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.silly-goo: A silly mod addin’ silly geese fer silly sailors.
